Uses of Package
de.systemagmbh.interfaces.splashscreen

Packages that use de.systemagmbh.interfaces.splashscreen
de.systemagmbh.interfaces.splashscreen   
 

Classes in de.systemagmbh.interfaces.splashscreen used by de.systemagmbh.interfaces.splashscreen
CSysSplashScreenException
          Thrown by services.
ISysSplashScreen
          This interface has to be implemented to create a splash screen using the factory class FSysSplashScreen.
ISysStartInterruptable
          A class that implements this interface shows that it can be closed when the splash screen is closed by the user to stop starting the application.
